Title: Air Control ATV
Description: App for Windows Phone to remote control Apple TV with FireCore aTV Flash (or Black) and AirControl installed.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
App for Windows Phone to remote control Apple TV with FireCore aTV Flash (or Black) and AirControl installed.

Features:
  • Multi function buttons
  • Text input
  • Shortcuts to My Media, Netflix and Youtube

Futures:
  • Now playing
  • Gesture pad
    • Swipe to navigate
    • Tap to select
    • Hold to long press
    • Two-finger tap to go back to menu
    • Tap zones for more commands
  • Haptic feedback
  • Now playing Live Tile
